article_title: Bernie Sanders And Republicans Both Urge Cadillac Tax Repeal

article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: Bernie Sanders and top Dems want to repeal the Cadillac tax, and so do Republicans. But what each would put in its place is quite different.
og.title: Bernie Sanders And Republicans Both Urge Cadillac Tax Repeal
